title: Notice
content:
wffweb-3.0.20 is released, upgrade your project now. Say good bye to anonymous style coding. Now you can use functional style coding instead of anonymous style coding.
wffweb-3.0.20 will be the last version in wffweb-3.x.x series.

wffweb-12.0.0 is released, it supports Java 17 or later. However, Java 21 or later is recommended for best performance as it can utilize Virtual Thread to do internal operations.
